text:
At the end of overgrown paths/ I halt,/ Close to the route, where/ Voices tether loose loops/ To my ears, sliding free/ As invisible bodies march/ Another few feet./

Soon, I am hid at a vantage/ Well above, as branches, as birds -/ Solitary, aware of limits/ Shoulders to fingers/ More ground than sky/ Tethered in a harsher way/ Yearning and still./
